==== Supported Date Formats ====

The value of the variable '''date''' should have one of the following formats:

* yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss
* EEE, d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z
* yyyy-MM-dd
* yyyy

==== Example ====

'''Important note:''' The example on this page requires that example data is loaded, see [[Help:ExampleData | how to load example data]].

Provided there are some projects with temporal and quantitative information, the widget could be embedded in the wiki page with the following code:
<source>
{{ #widget : Timeplot
  | query = 'SELECT (SUM(<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer>(?grant)) AS ?sumGrant) ?start WHERE {
      ?role <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/grant> ?grant . 
      ?role <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/project> ?project . 
      ?project <http://purl.org/stuff/project/startDate> ?start . 
      ?role <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/region> ?region . }
    GROUP BY ?start'
  | value = 'sumGrant'
  | date = 'start'
}}
</source>
